strapiPost.title: Bentonville Becoming More And More
strapiPost.content:
Like that late-bloomer high school kid who suddenly got hot in college, the once small town of Bentonville has transformed into a world-class destination attracting tourists and young professionals from all over. 

  • The artsy, athletic type: It is estimated that Crystal Bridges Museum attracts more than 500,000 people annually, and Bentonville’s growing reputation as the “mountain biking capital of the world” brings in approximately 250,000 cyclists per year. 
  • Growing up fast: In the last ten years alone, the once small town has grown by more than 50% and it continues to change rapidly, stirring up a range of emotions for long-time residents of the area as their once familiar town transforms day by day.

Read the full article from Business Insider HERE.
